name: UpdateGithubOrgMembership
description:
Update your GitHub organization membership settings.

This tool updates the membership status for the authenticated user in a specified GitHub organization. It is useful for changing your role or settings within an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. This should not be case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: membership_state
parameters.description: Set the state of the membership. Only accepts "active".

value_schema.description: The state that the membership should be in. Only `"active"` will be accepted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state that the membership should be in. Only `"active"` will be accepted.

value_schema.description: The state that the membership should be in. Only `"active"` will be accepted.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
